item.description:
I talked to the staff, I thought it would be a good place, so I scheduled an event as soon as possible.

If we do not get 4 people I will cancel.

Kitty Whist Night.

Hearts and or Spades may be played as a backup.

At The Farm (formally Cravings)
350 Rantoul St. Beverly MA


New players welcome, we will teach you how to play.
Do not be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full.

There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there.

Their specialty: Jr. Pulled Pork is $4.25 Super is 6.25.

There is now a modest membership fee of $2.00 quarterly. the fee is for the whole Salem Board Games group not just Kitty Whist.

You will see "How to pay: Pay online or by cash or check" and " Pay online " is on the home page of the group.
If you are a Kitty Whist player please mention that you are a Kitty Whist player, when you pay.

http://maps.google.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Kitty Whist and or Hearts and or Spades at the FARM in Beverly
